column9: 2015 at the walnut hill medical center of dallas. funeral services will be held on wednesday at 10:00 a. m. at the chapel of coker-mathews funeral home with rev. brent grissom officiating. burial will follow at shady grove cemetery. visitation will be on tuesday from 6:00 p. m. 8:00 p. m. at the funeral home. brenda was born in charleston
column11: 1945 to charles and jewel pauline garton ennis. she married robert carl skaggs on december 22
column12: 1961 in west virginia. brenda was a homemaker and a member of the red hat ladies and the first assembly of god. brenda is survived by her son
column18: sharon of west virginia; eight grandchildren and eight great-grandchildren. she is preceded in death by her parents; husband; and brothers
column20: jr. memorials may be made to the first assembly of god missionary fund
